Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text on recto (16 ll., the beginnings of all lost) and verso (vestiges of 3 ll.). Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Farming lease for a year - the relations of the persons named are obscure owing to the defects of the papyrus. [The verso has only jottings of sums]. Date. year 19 Thoth 30 [ of Ptol. Alexander] = BC. 96 Oct 15". Concerning this group of texts, see entry for P BM EA 10491.
Curator's comments: Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. Text 27 in Shore's Manuscript Catalogue of Demotic Gebelein Papyri in the British Museum. Publication in progress (C.J. Martin).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (350) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/350)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: magic tape Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
